channel.title: Recipes on The Recipe Book
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on The Recipe Book

item.title: Meat Loaf
item.description: INGREDIENTS: 2 lbs Hamburger Meat 2 eggs 1 can Rotel 1/2 cup water 1 cup crushed Pork rinds Worcestershire sauce pepper Garlic powder Topping: 1/4 cup brown sugar 2-3 squirts of mustard 1/3 cup catsup INSTRUCTIONS: Mix All INGREDIENTS together put in shallow dish linded with tinfoil make into loaf shape bake 350 degrees for 1hr

item.title: Tuna Marinade
item.description: INGREDIENTS: Mikoto Ginger Dressing Low Sodium soy Worcestershire sauce Garlic Pepper INSTRUCTIONS: Their is no mesasurement here just mix it however you want to.

item.title: Chewy Chocolate Chip Cookies
item.description: These are keto friendly INGREDIENTS: 1/2 cup Coconut flour 1/3 cup brown sugar 1/4 TSP baking soda 1/4 TSP salt 3 large eggs 1/3 cup butter melted and then cooled 1 tsp vanilla extract 1/2 cup heaping Chocolate chips INSTRUCTIONS: Preheat oven to 350 F Grease Cookie sheet Combine dry ingredients add wet ingredients mix till it makes a dough bake 12-14 minutes

item.title: Keto Muffins
item.description: INGREDIENTS: 1 Cup almond flour or 1/4 cup Coconut flour 1/2 cup heavy cream 1 large egg 1/4 blueberries or raspberries 1/4 cup keto sweetener of choice 1/2 tsp baking powder 1/2 tsp vanilla extract 1/4 tsp lemon juice 2 tablespoons of butter INSTRUCTIONS: Preheat oven to 350F melt butter and whisk eggs mix all ingredients pour into baking cups bake 20-25 minutes until golden brown

item.title: Baked Parmesan Zucchini
item.description: INGREDIENTS: 4 zucchini, quartered lengthwise 1/2 cup freshly grated Parmesan Italian Seasoning garlic powder salt and pepper, to taste 2 tablespoons olive oil INSTRUCTIONS: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a small bowl, combine Parmesan, Italian Seasoning, garlic powder, salt and pepper, to taste. Place zucchini onto baking sheet and/or grated. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with Parmesan mixture. Place into oven and bake until tender, about 15 minutes.

item.title: Keto Mousse
item.description: How to make KETO Mousse INGREDIENTS: 1-1/2 cup heavy whipping cream 2-3 tbsp un-sweetened cocoa powder 3 tbsp KETO powder sugar (think swerve) 1 tsp vanilla extract pinch of salt INSTRUCTIONS: Combine all ingredients & whisk to whip to fluffy texture. Store in fridge.

item.title: Worlds Best Steak Marinade
item.description: INGREDIENTS: 1/2 cup Balsamic Vinegar 1/4 Cup Soy Sauce 3 TBSP minced garlic 2 TBSP honey 2 TBSP olive oil 2 TSP ground black pepper 1 TSP Worcestershire Sauce 1 TSP Onion Powder INSTRUCTIONS:

item.title: Simple Steak Recipe
item.description: A Simple Steak Recipe. Click here See our cooking guide. INGREDIENTS: Steak Worcestershire sauce olive oil Garlic oregano Parsley thyme salt pepper Garlic butter INSTRUCTIONS: Cover the steaks in Garlic, oregano, Parsley, thyme, salt, pepper. Drip Worcestershire sauce and olive oil on the steaks. Rub oils and seasons on the steak, make sure to cover the sids. Place steaks in fridge and let sit for as log as you like.

item.title: Easy Air Fryer Wings
item.description: Easy Air Fryer cooking method for naked wings. Cover with your own sauce, ranch or eat them naked after cooking INGREDIENTS: Nonstick cooking spray, for the basket Thawed Wings INSTRUCTIONS: Spray the basket of a 3.5-quart air fryer with cooking spray and set aside. Pat the chicken wings dryPlace the wings in the fryer basket so they are not touching Set the air fryer to 360 degrees F and cook for 12 minutes, then flip the wings with tongs and cook for 12 minutes more.

item.title: Keto Breakfast Egg Bites
item.description: Recipe makes close to 12 egg bites depending on what size eggs you use, you can easily double or triple the recipe, to make more or less… INGREDIENTS: 10 eggs 1 cup of any cheese you would like. 1/2 cup full fat cottage cheese 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt Couple cracks of fresh black pepper As much bacon as you want Non-stick spray I like canola oil INSTRUCTIONS: Pre-heat oven to 300 F degrees and place a baking dish that is filled with some water on the bottom rack.
